name: DuoRC
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A reading comprehension dataset with 186,089 QA pairs from parallel movie plot summaries.
size: 186,089 unique QA pairs over 7,680 pairs of movie plots.
notes: The dataset comprises two subsets: SelfRC, with questions and answers from the same plot summary, and ParaphraseRC, where questions from one plot are answered using the other, testing cross-document reasoning and paraphrase understanding.
